meanings.definition: To fit or equip (a ship, room, etc.) with new or altered fittings.
meanings.sent1: The sailors were refitting the ship with stronger sails.
meanings.sent2: She spent the weekend refitting her bedroom with colorful curtains.
meanings.sent3: The pirates were refitting their ship with disco lights for a party at sea.
meanings.sent4: He was refitting his car with turbo boosters, turning it into a racing machine.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter was refitting the old cabinet, transforming it into a modern piece of furniture.
